committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim February 16 as Bataan-Corregidor Day.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to proclaim February 16 as "Bataan-Corregidor Day" in observance of the anniversary of the recapture of Bataan and Corregidor and as a tribute to the gallant American and Phillipine soldiers who forget to defend the principles of freedom.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim February 16 as Bataan-Corregidor Day.
